summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Strategy-Specific Configurations feature. All backend endpoints working correctly (GET /status with strategy_configs, GET /strategy-configs, PUT /strategy-configs/{strategy}, POST /demo-trade). Frontend displays all 6 strategy configurations with Edit buttons, timeframe badges (SCALP/INTRADAY/SWING/POSITION) with appropriate colors, and EOD Close badges. Demo trades correctly apply strategy-specific settings (timeframe, close_at_eod, trail_pct, scale_out_pcts).
passed_tests: GET /api/trading-bot/status includes strategy_configs object
GET /api/trading-bot/status - strategy_configs contains all 6 strategies (rubber_band, vwap_bounce, breakout, squeeze, trend_continuation, position_trade)
GET /api/trading-bot/strategy-configs returns all strategy configurations
Each strategy config has timeframe, trail_pct, scale_out_pcts, close_at_eod fields
rubber_band config: timeframe=scalp, close_at_eod=True
squeeze config: timeframe=swing, close_at_eod=False, trail_pct=0.025
position_trade config: timeframe=position, close_at_eod=False, trail_pct=0.03
PUT /api/trading-bot/strategy-configs/rubber_band updates trail_pct and close_at_eod
PUT /api/trading-bot/strategy-configs/nonexistent returns 404
POST /api/trading-bot/demo-trade with rubber_band creates trade with timeframe=scalp, close_at_eod=true
POST /api/trading-bot/demo-trade with squeeze creates trade with timeframe=swing, close_at_eod=false, trail_pct=0.025
POST /api/trading-bot/demo-trade with position_trade creates trade with timeframe=position, close_at_eod=false, trail_pct=0.03
Demo trade scale_out_config includes strategy-specific scale_out_pcts
Frontend: Trading Bot settings panel shows Strategy Configurations section
Frontend: 6 Edit buttons for each strategy configuration
Frontend: Edit form shows Trail Stop % input and Close at EOD toggle
Frontend: SCALP badge displayed in orange/yellow color
Frontend: SWING badge displayed in cyan color
Frontend: POSITION badge displayed in violet/purple color
Frontend: INTRADAY badge displayed in yellow color
Frontend: EOD Close badge shown for trades with close_at_eod=true
Frontend: EOD Close badge NOT shown for trades with close_at_eod=false (swing/position)
Frontend: Strategy config shows timeframe badge, Trail %, EOD status, Scale percentages
critical_code_review_comments: STRATEGY_CONFIG dict correctly defines 6 strategies with timeframe, trail_pct, scale_out_pcts, close_at_eod (lines 58-104)
TradeTimeframe enum properly defines SCALP, INTRADAY, SWING, POSITION (lines 49-54)
get_strategy_configs() and update_strategy_config() methods work correctly (lines 320-351)
BotTrade dataclass includes timeframe and close_at_eod fields (lines 156, 202)
Demo trade endpoint correctly applies strategy config to new trades (lines 422-532)
_check_eod_close method closes trades with close_at_eod=true at 3:50 PM ET (lines 836-866)
Frontend TradingBotPanel.jsx correctly displays timeframe badges with color coding (lines 151-159)
Frontend shows EOD Close badge for trades with close_at_eod=true (lines 160-164)
Frontend Strategy Configurations UI allows editing trail_pct and close_at_eod (lines 778-881)
seed_data_creation: Created and rejected 3 demo trades (NVDA rubber_band, AAPL squeeze, MSFT position_trade) for testing strategy configs
context_for_next_testing_agent: Strategy-specific configurations feature is fully implemented and tested. Key points: (1) STRATEGY_CONFIG dict in trading_bot_service.py defines 6 strategies with timeframe, trail_pct, scale_out_pcts, close_at_eod, (2) GET /api/trading-bot/strategy-configs returns all configs, PUT /api/trading-bot/strategy-configs/{strategy} updates them, (3) Demo trades apply strategy config including timeframe badge and close_at_eod flag, (4) Frontend shows Strategy Configurations section in settings with Edit buttons, (5) Timeframe badges: SCALP (orange), INTRADAY (yellow), SWING (cyan), POSITION (violet), (6) EOD Close badge appears only for trades with close_at_eod=true, (7) rubber_band trail_pct was tested with 0.012 update and restored to 0.01

backend_api_status.GET /api/trading-bot/status: Working - includes strategy_configs with all 6 strategies
backend_api_status.GET /api/trading-bot/strategy-configs: Working - returns configs with timeframe, trail_pct, scale_out_pcts, close_at_eod
backend_api_status.POST /api/trading-bot/demo-trade: Working - applies strategy config to new trades

frontend_ui.strategy_configs_section: Working - Shows in settings panel with Edit buttons
frontend_ui.eod_close_badge: Working - Shows for trades with close_at_eod=true
frontend_ui.edit_form: Working - Shows trail_pct input and EOD toggle
